titles.title: Rural Law Enforcement Assistance Act of 2009
A bill to provide Federal assistance to States for rural law enforcement and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S136-137)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Rural Law Enforcement Assistance Act of 2009 - Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize appropriations for FY2009-FY2013 for rural drug enforcement assistance.
Amends the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994 to authorize appropriations for FY2009-FY2013 for training rural law enforcement officers in the investigation of drug trafficking and related crimes.
